8. Iroko is a type of _ (a) fruit (b) timber (c) flower
9. Abora is a type of _ (a) animal (b) rock (c) timber
10. Ebony is a type of _ (a) fabric (b) timber (c) food
11. Mahogany is a type of _ (a) tree (b) metal (c) plastic

13. Pestle and mortar can be made from _ (a) glass (b) wood (c) plastic
14. Hangers can be made from _ (a) paper (b) wood (c) sand
15. A chair is a type of _ (a) food (b) furniture (c) animal

18. Shelves are a type of _ (a) toy (b) furniture (c) game
19. A cupboard is a type of _ (a) instrument (b) furniture (c) fruit
